data.title: Ondas to Acquire Roboteam, Expanding Market Footprint and Multi-Domain Autonomy with Field-Proven Tactical Ground Robotics
data.description: Expands OAS's mission portfolio with Roboteam's rugged, multi-mission tactical ground robotics deployed by leading global defense customers Roboteam's established deployments with leading militaries across 30 countries expected to provide Ondas with ...
data.keywords: Ondas Networks, Autonomous Systems, OAS, unmanned ground vehicles, Roboteam, homeland security, Ondas Holdings "Roboteam, Ondas Holdings, Roboteam HUB, operational effectiveness
